channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How you can maximize credit cards for a cross-country move
item.description: Planning a big move? Learn how to use credit cards, bonus categories and welcome offers to turn major moving expenses into valuable points and miles.

item.title: United completes another historic inaugural with first-ever nonstop flight to South Australia
item.description: On Dec. 11, 2025, United Airlines began three-times weekly service to Adelaide, Australia from San Francisco aboard a Boeing 787-9 Dreamliner. TPG was...

item.title: Chase Freedom Unlimited review: A great card for beginners and pros alike
item.description: What makes this 1.5% cash-back card so special? The fact that it's not just a cash-back card but also a jumping-off point for incredible travel redemp...

item.title: How (and why) to book United flights with Aeroplan points
item.description: Learn how Aeroplan points can help you book United flights for less, along with smart ways to earn and transfer points
